entry.title: Open Design Engine - Feature #152: Add "Create new page" button to wiki system
entry.content:
I believe the reason it's done this way is to try and reduce orphan pages, i.e. pages that aren't linked to by another page within the Wiki.

    If it's decided to implement this, it will also require the addition of a way to set the title of the page (as a note to remember later)
